During this session we have the following goals:

  * Introduce the concept of functions from $\mathbb{R}^2\to \mathbb{R}$ y $\mathbb{R}^3\to\mathbb{R}$. <br/><br/>
  * We will introduce the concept of graphs and the level curves. <br/><br/>
  * We will present the conics and their particularities. <br/><br/>
